participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, enjoys outdoor activities and photography.
participant_1.background: I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang. I love spending my free time taking photos with my best friend. I moved to work for an organization that better aligns with my values. I used to be a huge Superman fan as a child. I am terrible at math.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and supportive, enjoys humor and values family.
participant_2.background: I love Halloween because it is the only time of year when I can dress up and be someone else. My wife is a breast cancer survivor. I enjoy comedies, and my best friend is Abigail. I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.

content.text: I love Halloween because it is the only time of year when I can dress up and be someone else.
That is one reason I love it too! My best friend is Abigail and she is a huge Halloween fan! Do you have a favorite superhero?
I used to be a huge Superman fan as a child. What's your favorite kind of comedy?
I enjoy all kinds of comedies but I usually end up watching romantic comedies. Do you have a favorite car?
I used to have a 1965 Mustang but I had to sell it. I still love looking at old Mustangs though!
I like cars too but I am not very good at working on them. My wife is a breast cancer survivor and I am so proud of her!
That is amazing! I am so happy for her! I moved to work for an organization that better aligns with my values.
That is great! I am glad you are happy with your job. I love spending my free time taking photos with my best friend.
What is your favorite thing to do in the summer? I enjoy playing tennis and taking pictures.
I love going to the beach and swimming! I also enjoy going to concerts and watching movies
